NewsArticle.Title: The Order of Danaan Meets Again
NewsArticle.Content:
There again stands a man possessing the Ca√≠ dh Leabhar. He ventures to Suomi, home of Deoch, God of Light. Standing in the area claimed before for Danaan, his Mass begins.
The Order of Danaan reconvenes to bring worship and glory to the Lightbringer Danaan. A call goes out to summon the faithful to the fields of Suomi.
((The Order of Danaan will meet July 16, at 7:00 PM PST. As with previous Masses, there is NO experience or legend marks to be gained from attendance, and it is purely a roleplay activity.))
